description: Government, public sector, and federal applications

questions.question: What FedRAMP authorization level is required?
questions.why: Low, Moderate, or High impact levels have vastly different control requirements

questions.question: What Section 508 accessibility requirements apply?
questions.why: Federal agencies require WCAG 2.1 AA compliance for all user interfaces

questions.question: Are there data sovereignty or residency requirements?
questions.why: Data may need to stay within US borders, specific regions, or government clouds

questions.question: Are security clearances required for personnel?
questions.why: Affects who can access systems, code, and data; impacts hiring and operations

questions.question: What FISMA compliance requirements apply?
questions.why: Federal Information Security Management Act requires specific security controls and reporting

questions.question: What are the procurement and contracting constraints?
questions.why: Technology choices may be limited by existing contracts, approved vendor lists, or regulations

questions.question: What identity and access management requirements exist?
questions.why: CAC/PIV card authentication, HSPD-12 compliance may be required

questions.question: What continuous monitoring and reporting is required?
questions.why: FedRAMP requires continuous monitoring, vulnerability scanning, and monthly reporting

questions.question: Are there specific records retention requirements?
questions.why: Federal records management rules may require specific retention periods and formats

questions.question: What interoperability with existing government systems is required?
questions.why: Legacy system integration may require specific protocols, data formats, or middleware
